data.title: Hermann Einstein, My Mother Is Pauline Koch and My Sister Is Maya
data.meta_description: Hello Teacher - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Albert Einstein was a German-born physicist and mathematician who was born in Ulm, Germany in 1879. He is most famous for discovering the theory of relativity and the photoelectric effect, as well as brownian motion. He received many awards including the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1921. Einstein had dual German and Swiss citizenship and later became an American citizen. He married his first wife, Mileva Maric, in 1903 with whom he had two sons. Einstein later divorced Mileva and married his cousin Elsa. He died in 1955 in Princeton, New Jersey at the age of 76.
